mapper.insert: insert into km_audit_log( op_type, op_action, op_action_ext1, op_action_ext2, op_action_ext3, op_action_ext4, op_message, op_timestamp, op_ip, op_operator, is_op_succ )values( #{type}, #{action}, #{actionExt1}, #{actionExt2}, #{actionExt3}, #{actionExt4}, #{message}, #{timestamp}, #{ip}, #{operator}, #{isOpSucc} )
mapper.select: select id, op_type as type, op_action as action, op_action_ext1 as actionExt1, op_action_ext2 as actionExt2, op_action_ext3 as actionExt3, op_action_ext4 as actionExt4, op_message, op_timestamp as timestamp, op_ip as ip, op_operator as operator, is_op_succ as isOpSucc from km_audit_log
